name: Palak Paneer
steps: Chop and wash the spinach and grind to a paste.
Heat 25 gms butter in a frying pan and fry the paneer lightly and keep aside.
In the remaining butter in the frying pan fry the red chillies, then add onion, garlic, green chillie paste and turmeric powder and stir fry till oil separates from the mixture.
Add Spinach paste, sugar and salt and cook for 10 minutes stirring continuously.
Add paneer cubes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add garam masala, tomato ketchup and the remaining 25 gms butter and stir continuously till the mixture acquires a tight consistency.
